segments.text: I can promise you that , if you buy our product , you will be getting A-l quality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've looked at your units , and am very happy with them . Your goods are all far above standard quality .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We spend a lot of money to make sure that our quality is much better . We won't sacrifice quality for quick profits .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we're really interested in placing an order under negotiation . We can start the negotiations as soon as you want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great , I'm glad we'll be able to do business together . I'll have some quotations ready for you by tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . As well , would you mind if I asked to see the Loyd's surveyor report of your products ? I may have a few more questions about your quality analysis .
segments.speaker: S2
